sections.xtalAdvantage: One price. All features. No setup fees. No contracts. Pay for what you use.

questions.q: What happens if I go over 50,000 searches?
questions.a: We'll reach out to discuss volume pricing before you hit the cap. No surprise cutoffs, no automatic overage charges. We'll find a rate that works for your volume.
No. No setup fees, no per-SKU charges, no implementation costs, no annual commitments. The per-search price includes everything: all features, all integrations, standard support.
Monthly billing based on actual usage. You'll get an invoice at the end of each month for searches used. We accept all major credit cards and can do invoicing/ACH for Enterprise plans.

questions.q: Can I estimate my search volume?
questions.a: Check your analytics for 'site search' sessions or queries. In Google Analytics, it's under Behavior > Site Search. In Shopify, look at your Search Terms report. If you're not sure, we can help estimate during the demo.

questions.q: What if my volume varies seasonally?
questions.a: Usage-based pricing handles this automatically. You pay more in peak months, less in slow months. No need to commit to a tier that covers your Black Friday volume year-round.

questions.q: Do you offer discounts for startups or non-profits?
questions.a: Yes. Reach out and we'll talk. We're not going to let budget be the reason you're stuck with bad search.

faqSchema.question: How much does XTAL Search cost?
faqSchema.answer: XTAL Search costs $0.10 per search, up to 50,000 searches per month. A store with 15,000 monthly searches would pay $1,500/month. Volume pricing is available for stores exceeding 50,000 searches.

faqSchema.question: How do I get started with XTAL Search?
faqSchema.answer: Request a demo and we'll connect XTAL to your real product catalog. You'll see how it handles your actual search queries and product data before making any commitment.

faqSchema.question: Are there setup fees for XTAL Search?
faqSchema.answer: No. XTAL has no setup fees, no implementation costs, and no annual contracts. The per-search price includes all features, all platform integrations, and standard support.

faqSchema.question: How does XTAL Search pricing compare to Algolia?
faqSchema.answer: Algolia charges around $1 per 1,000 searches plus record storage fees and typically requires engineering resources to configure. XTAL's $0.10/search includes full LLM-powered search with no configuration required, often resulting in lower total cost of ownership.
